channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Secure Proxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Secure Proxy

item.title: CVE-2023-32338|2024-09-19T15:14:21.391Z -- ibm -- sterling%20secure%20proxy
item.description: IBM Sterling Secure Proxy and IBM Sterling External Authentication Server 6.0.3 and 6.1.0 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user with container access. IBM X-Force ID: 255585.
